name: Mew
author: Keiko Fukuyama
flavor_text: This Pokémon’s body is covered by fine hairs that can be seen only under a microscope.

attacks.name: Rainbow Wave
attacks.effect: Choose a type of Energy other than {C} attached to Mew. This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent’s Pokémon of that type (including Benched Pokémon). Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance.
